name: Intelitek Edu-Solutions
description:
INTELITEK EDU SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED is based in Bengaluru, Karnataka, India.
 As a key player in Automation technology, Electrical engineering & Electronics engineering teaching equipment & Mechatronincs Lab Equipments / Trainers Kit, Fluid Engineering Products, Machine Lab setup kits over Indian market and Abroad, Intelitek designs creative, interactive learning strategies for industry and education in order to empower people to master technical systems, Solve everyday problems and adapt quickly to a changing workplace, We work with our clients to provide a learning experience that is unmatched. Our training solutions were designed and developed by staff who are experts in their field, Integrating best education and training practices to offer knowledge and skills for real jobs,Our quality is characterized by the ability to provide world class service and support for these solutions.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
headquarter: Channenahalli Village, Bangalore South, India , Karnataka,
Headline: inspire teachers and engage students in technical education programs to change the workforce around the world.
ShortDescription: Intelitek is the world leader in immersive practical education based on skills.
enhanced_description: Intelitek Edu-Solutions specializes in providing creative, interactive learning strategies and teaching equipment for technical education across various domains including Automation, Electrical engineering, Electronics engineering, Mechatronics, Fluid Engineering, and Machine Lab setups. Serving both the Indian and international markets, the company aims to empower individuals to master technical systems, solve problems, and adapt to evolving workplaces. Their training solutions, designed by field experts and integrating best educational practices, offer practical, skill-based knowledge for real-world job readiness. As a leader in immersive practical education, Intelitek focuses on accelerating skill development and learning efficiency, providing world-class service and support.
key_use_cases: Blended learning (combining physical labs with digital content)
competitive_advantages: Integration of best education and training practices
Focus on practical and real-world job skills
World-class service and support for solutions
deployment_options: On-premise (for physical lab equipment and trainers)
